attributes.action: Appoint Simon DeMontfort-Broughton as the new minister for living history groups
attributes.additional_details: Simon has 27 years experience in ww2 and medieval re-enactments and was king of the  medieval circuits, ex army and ex dog handler and full time historian and enthusiast who is liked by many
attributes.background: To regulate the standards of training and displays across the uk including the safety of weaponry used and integrity of groups/societies individual trainning for personal and public safety
